channel.title: I need help with my vps for rsps
channel.description:
Okay so i brought a Linux VPS 2GB RAM.
The source and client i am using: Foxtrot 718
I have unzipped the server(source) into my server directory, i just need help from there. I need help getting it online so people can join! If you know how to get a rsps LINUX online then please add me on skype. Skype: InsideProjectPS3
If you are able to help me then i will make you admin of the rsps.

item.title: I need help with my vps for rsps
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

A VPS is basically a computer, but not at your location.

You do the exact same thing you would when hosting on your computer, but through a remote connection.
And you typically don’t need to do portforward either, so that’s a bonus.

Server:

Download a copy of the server to your VPS.
Download/Install Java
Set your Environmental Variables (Sometimes optional)
Run server

Client:
Change IP to the new one
Jar & Sign client
[TEST THAT IT WORKS]
Distribute client

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my vps for rsps
